attributes.action: Abolish the Warning Voice on Buses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see the completely unnecessary recorded voice on London buses, which says 'Bus stopping at next bus stop, please stand well clear of doors' at each and every bus stop, scrapped. It is unecessary and infuriating.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
